title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Graphs, Paths and circuits, Trees and fundamental circuits, cut-sets and cut-vertices, planar and dual graphs, coloring, covering and partitioning, direct graphs, Enumeration of graphs, Graph theoretic algorithms and applications.
